Uses of Class
searchsort.SortableBar

    • Uses of SortableBar in searchsort

      Methods in searchsort that return SortableBar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SortableBar BarArray.get(int index)
      returns the SortableBar in this BarArray at location "index" without removing it.
      static SortableBar SortableBar.makeTargetSortableBar(double searchValue)
      creates a sortableBar that can be used in comparisons to find a bar with the given value in the currentComparisonType.
      Methods in searchsort with parameters of type SortableBar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractSearchThread.announceFoundBar(SortableBar bar, int index)
      shows a popup window that says you found the bar, the bar's information and the index at which you found it.
      boolean SortableBar.deepEquals(SortableBar other)
      behaves like the equals() method, but compares all the attributes of this SortableBar with the given one.
      void BarArray.set(int index, SortableBar value)
      replaces the SortableBar in position Index with value, losing whatever content was previously there.
      Constructors in searchsort with parameters of type SortableBar 
      Constructor and Description
      SortableBar(SortableBar source)
      creates a new SortableBar that is a copy of the source.
